alert.note: Alert for Boyle; Casey; Marion; Taylor (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 12:49PM EDT until August 21 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Marion County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Taylor County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Boyle County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Casey County in central Kentucky... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1249 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lebanon, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Marion, northeastern Taylor, southwestern Boyle and northwestern Casey Counties, including the following locations... Calvary, Bradfordsville, Greenbriar, Gravel Switch, Forkland, Phillipsburg, Salleetown, Jacktown, Riley and Poplar Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
